Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package view.screens

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.screens.Screen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver, TurnObserver, MessageTarget, Observer, View
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoardScreen, ConnectionErrorScreen, ConnectionScreen, CreditsScreen, GodSelectionScreen, MenuScreen, PickGodScreen, WinnerScreen
    public abstract class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
implements View, MessageTarget
    A generic screen of the view (every screen of the view must extend this class) The screen is a View and gets messages from the server through the server listeners

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected boolean activeScreen
      If the screen is active a player could interact with such screen, making actions that will send messages to the server
      protected ViewManager view
      The view manager that handles the flow of the screens and their transitions

        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies the GameObservers of the change of the GameState, send the state to the observers
        Specified by:
        receiveGameState in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        state - A Game.State enum type, identifies the new state of the Game
        activePlayerName - Contains the active player name, this player will be the next player to do an action

        Specified by:
        receivePlayerList in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        list - A map with keys all player names and values the name of the god pick from other players, if the player has not picked a god the value will be null
